#summary Compiling
= How to compile P3DFFT =
./configure --with-fftw=<path to FFTW3 library> FCFLAGS=<Fortran compiler flags> CFLAGS=<C compiler flags> LDFLAGS=<libraries to link>

Use --enable-single to compile with Single Precision

=== How to compile on Triton for PGI ===
_Note: You must load the module fftw first!_

./configure --enable-pgi="yes" --with-fftw="$FFTWHOME" FCFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64 -Mextend -byteswapio" CFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64" LDFLAGS="-lmpi_f90 -lmpi_f77 -pgf90libs -lmyriexpress"

== How to compile on Triton for Intel ==
_Note: You must load the module fftw first!_

./configure --enable-dstride1 --with-fftw="$FFTWHOME" FCFLAGS="-O3 -xW -132 -fpp" CFLAGS="-O3 -xW" LDFLAGS="-lmpi_f90 -lmpi_f77 -lmyriexpress"


=== How to compile on TACC for PGI ===
_Note: You must load the module fftw3 first!_

./configure --enable-pgi="yes" --with-fftw="$TACC_FFTW3_DIR" FCFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64 -Mextend -byteswapio" CFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64" LDFLAGS="-pgf90libs" 

=== How to compile on Kraken for PGI ===
_Note: You must load the module fftw first!_

./configure --enable-fftw --with-fftw="$FFTW_DIR/.." --enable-useeven --enable-stride1 --enable-pgi FC=ftn FCFLAGS="-fastsse -tp istanbul-64 -Mextend -byteswapio"  CC=cc CFLAGS="-fastsse -tp istanbul-64"
